COMBO.DESCRIPTION: Each attack type can combo with specific attack types. When combo, cards cost 1 less and damage is increased by fibonacci sequence. (1,1,2,3,5,8 etc.)

DISTRACTED.DESCRIPTION: Distracted creature deal 10% less and receive 10% more damage per stack this turn.

BLEEDING.DESCRIPTION: Deal (stack amount / 2) damage every turn, enemy receive 1% more attack damage and poison damage for each stack.

FATIGUE.DESCRIPTION: Fatigue is an unplayable status card. At the end of the turn, doesn't discard and makes you draw 1 less card next turn.
